statements: SELECT * FROM robot_logs LIMIT 10
SELECT log_id, robot_id, log_timestamp FROM robot_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT robot_id, log_message FROM robot_logs WHERE log_id = 5
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM robot_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-02-01'
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM robot_logs WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT log_id, robot_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM robot_logs WHERE robot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM robot_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM robot_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM robot_logs GROUP BY robot_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT robot_id, DATE(log_timestamp) AS log_date, AVG(log_id) AS avg_log_id FROM robot_logs GROUP BY robot_id, log_date ORDER BY avg_log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE error_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, error_message FROM error_logs ORDER BY error_time DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE error_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT diagnostic_id, robot_id, cpu_temperature FROM diagnostics WHERE cpu_temperature > 70;
SELECT robot_id, SUM(battery_voltage) AS total_voltage FROM diagnostics GROUP BY robot_id;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE robot_id = 1 AND error_time > '2022-03-01 00:00:00';
SELECT MAX(error_time) AS max_error_time FROM error_logs;
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM error_logs GROUP BY robot_id ORDER BY error_count DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE error_message LIKE '%timeout%' ORDER BY error_time DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT diagnostics.robot_id, AVG(battery_voltage) AS avg_battery_voltage FROM diagnostics INNER JOIN error_logs ON diagnostics.robot_id = error_logs.robot_id GROUP BY diagnostics.robot_id HAVING avg_battery_voltage > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_battery_voltage DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE robot_id = 5;
SELECT robot_name, model_number FROM robots WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system_diagnostics;
SELECT robot_id, error_message FROM error_logs WHERE error_id < 100;
SELECT robot_name, model_number FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name ASC;
SELECT error_message FROM error_logs WHERE error_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, status FROM robots WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT robot_id, error_message, timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT diagnostic_info->>'manufacturer' AS manufacturer, diagnostic_info->>'version' AS version FROM system_diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM error_logs;
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE robot_id = 123;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, firmware_version FROM robots WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT diagnostic_id, diagnostic_message FROM diagnostics WHERE diagnostic_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM error_logs ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_name, firmware_version FROM robots WHERE manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT diagnostic_message AS message, diagnostic_timestamp AS timestamp FROM diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 5;
SELECT robot_name, error_message FROM robots r INNER JOIN error_logs e ON r.robot_id = e.robot_id WHERE r.firmware_version = 'V2.0';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM error_logs WHERE error_type = 'critical';
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY error_time DESC;
SELECT robot_name, operational_status FROM robots WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT type_name, description FROM log_types WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT robot_id, SUM(total_errors) AS total_errors FROM robot_statistics GROUP BY robot_id HAVING total_errors > 10;
SELECT id, diagnostic_message FROM system_diagnostics WHERE robot_id = 3 ORDER BY diagnostic_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE error_code = 404;
SELECT robot_name, operational_status FROM robots WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT error_message, error_time FROM error_logs WHERE robot_id = 3 ORDER BY error_time DESC;
SELECT robot_name, total_errors, total_diagnostics FROM robots JOIN robot_statistics ON robots.id = robot_id WHERE operational_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM system_diagnostics WHERE diagnostic_code BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY diagnostic_time ASC;
